ThingDef.label: CELEGRAVâ„¢ "Xuan Qiong" Phase Anti-gravity Core
ThingDef.description: Phase-field nexus of floating weapon systems. This self-stabilizing resonant cavity anti-gravity generator employs quantized graviton modulation to provide fundamental levitation fields for all floating platforms, while establishing reference coordinate systems for mounted weapons/engineering units.\n\nBoth design complexity and manufacturing precision exceed our current technological capabilities. Acquisition exclusively available through CAG merchant shuttles.
